1.1.name: wordpress/datamafia-dash-note
1.1.description:
You have a blog on Wordpress. Good job.

You have a few people adding content. They keep calling and email you on the same damn things. "What width should i make images to have them fit full page, what is the link for the google docs, what are your drop box emails, where is the logo for the site kept?"

Dash Note provides a dashboard widget with full editor capability to keep users up to date. Almost as if a MOTD for the dash board. Hmm, that would have been a good name.

When activated there is a "Dash Note" link on the Dashboard menu. This link takes you to the WYSIWYG editor with not one but TWO SAVE BUTTONS!
